content: The best film every shot in ,#,Ireland,. ,#,BarryLyndon,https://,twitter.com/andreas_grabe/,status/990700535710998528, ,…
Good story. I once rented it out but didn’t get chance to watch so had to bring it back.
Stanley Kubrick used the same camera lenses to film Barry Lyndon as he used to fake moon landings, so result is visually glorious,
